name: Spaceship Fighter: Galaxy War
description:
Spaceship Fighter: Galaxy War Frontier is a visually stunning and highly challenging old school galaxy shooter. fighters.Squadron strike force controller touch screen and powerful system will make you fascinated by thid game. Can sit fired fleet spaceship battle games.
- Many fierce battle scenes in air jet fighter
- Smooth game control
- Great Graphic
- Beautiful environments
- Multiple missions with different levels
- Intense battles with enemies leaders
- Hundreds of a jet plane shooting games screen is updated continuously
